page.title: 02SCHOOL LIFE, LLANELLY HILL
page.content: Our school was built in the year 1875.It is called,Darenfelen Junior School.The first Head Master was called Mr Jeffrey Railton and there was 75 children when he taught. Our Head Master now is called Mr Roberts he teaches the classes 3 and 4. There is also another teacher,she is called Mrs Williams who teaches the classes 1 and 2.She takes us for sewing which is very nice, but only the girls take sewing. We have got some tadpoles,we started looking after them since they were frogspawn.They are now tadpoles with little back legs.We feed them on little bits of raw meat and pondweeds and little minute bugs. If you are very very naughty you will not be able to go out for (CONT. P.3)
